title: Popcorn.Time.0.3.1.Official.[win-mac-linux32-linux64].[get-popco
description:
Popcorn Time
============

To allow any computer user to watch movies easily streaming from torrents, without any particular knowledge.


APIs Currently used:
====================

YIFY movie torrents API.
YifySubtitles for movie subtitles
OpenSubtitles for tv shows subtitles
Trakt.tv for movies metadata.
EZTV for TV Show torrents

Github: https://github.com/popcorn-official/popcorn-app
